rukus.text: 44|1|Hā mīmu.
44|2|(Jibutsu o) meiryō ni suru, kono Keisuke ni kakete (chikau).
44|3|Hontōni ware wa, shukufuku sa reta yoru, kore o kudashite,(aku ni taishite fudan ni) keikoku o atae (yō to su)ru monodearu.
44|4|Sono (yoru) ni wa, eichi ni tsuite subete no koto ga meikaku ni sa reru.
44|5|Waga moto kara no meireidearu. Hontōni ware ga (itsumo shito o) tsukawasu no wa,
44|6|anata no nushi kara no jihidearu. Hontōni kare wa, zen Akira ni shite zenchi de arare,
44|7|ten to ji, soshite sonoaida no subete no mono no omodearu. Moshi anata gata (no shinkō) ga tashikanaraba.
44|8|Kare no soto ni kami wa naku,-sei o sazuke shi o sadzuke rareru. Anata gata no shu, mata anata gata no sosen no omode ara reru.
44|9|Sorenanoni kare-ra wa utagatte, tawamurete iru.
44|10|Matte i nasai, ten ga meiryōna enmu o okosu hi made.
44|11|(Soreha) hitobito o tsutsumu. (Kare-ra wa iu).`Kore wa itamashī chōbatsudesu.'
44|12|`Omo yo, watashi-tachi kara kono chōbatsu o menjite kudasai. Hontōni shinkō itashimasu.'
44|13|Dōshite (futatabi) kare-ra ni kunji ga arou. Kare-ra ni wa kōmeina shito ga tashika ni kita no ni,
44|14|kare-ra wa kare (shito) kara somuki satte,`tanin ni ire Chie sa reta mono, tsukareta monodesu.' To ittade wanai ka.
44|15|Ware ga shibarakunoaida, chōbatsu o kaijo suru to, anata gata wa kanarazu (fushinjin ni) modoru.
44|16|Ware ga mōshū suru (shinpan no) Ni~Tsu, hontōni ware wa,(gensei ni) hōfuku suru.
44|17|Kare-ra izen ni mo, ware wa firuaun no min o kokoromita. Sonotoki kare-ra ni tōtoi shito (mūsā) ga kite,
44|18|(itta. ) `Arrā no shimo be-tachi (Isuraeru no shison) o, watashi ni kaeshi nasai. Hontōni watashi wa, anata gata no moto ni yattekita seijitsuna shitodesu.
44|19|Arrā ni taishite, kōmandeatte wa narimasen. Hontōni watashi wa meihakuna ken'i o motte, anata gata no tokoro ni yattekita nodesu.
44|20|Anata gataga (watashi o) ishi uchi ni surunara, watashi soshite anata gata no omode mo aru okata ni, sukui o motomemasu.
44|21|Moshi anata gataga, watashi o shinjinainaraba, watashi ni wa kamawanaide kudasai.'
44|22|Sokode, kare wa omoni ino~tsu(te i~tsu)ta. `Korera wa tsumibukai hitobitodesu.'
44|23|(-Nushi no o kotae ga atta. ) `Anata wa yoru no naka ni, waga shimo be to tomoni tabidate. Kanarazu anata gata ni otte ga kakarou.
44|24|Soshite umi wa (watatta nochi) waketa mama ni shite oke. Hontōni kare-ra wa, oborete shimau kotodearou.'
44|25|Kare-ra wa, ikaga ni ōku no en to izumi o nokoshita ka.
44|26|Mata (yutakana) kokumotsu no hata to, kōfukuna sumai o,
44|27|mata kare-ra ga soko de kyōraku shite ita yoi mono o (nokoshita ka. )
44|28|(Kare-ra no nochi wa) kōdeatta. Soshite ware wa,-gai no min ni (sorera o) tsuga seta.
44|29|Kare-ra no tame ni, ten mo ji mo nakazu, kare-ra ni yūyo mo atae rarenakatta.
